AboutUs.AboutTitle: Republican center for the development of living conditions of the population
AboutUs.AboutDesc: The priority tasks of the Republican Center for the Development of Living Conditions of the Population of the Republic of Uzbekistan “Taraqqiyot” are as follows:
AboutUs.third: construction of a drinking water supply system
AboutUs.fifth: purchase and use of high-quality materials
AboutUs.sixth: training personnel to operate the water supply system
AboutUs.seventh: training personnel in the design of water supply systems
AboutUs.twelfth: development of tariff plans for drinking water
AboutUs.thirteenth: preparation of project documentation and further technical support and service
AboutUs.paragref: These goals are achieved through the coordinated efforts of experts with a rich skills and experience in the water sector.
AboutUs.secondParagref: The organizational structure of the center supports the concept of improving the living standards of the population by increasing their knowledge and utilizing decision-making techniques to address social and infrastructure gaps

history.mainTitle: Background of the creation Community and development support center NGO “Taraqqiyot”.
history.firstDesc: Community and development center “Taraqqiyot” was created based on the platform of the Water Supply and Sanitation Project for Rural Areas of the Ferghana Valley of the Republic of Uzbekistan. The project implementation period was from 2004 to 2019. The project was funded by the Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation of the Swiss Confederation and was implemented by the International Secretariat for Water Canada. During this period, 32 systems were built, more than 160,000 thousand people in rural areas gained access to clean drinking water along with improved sanitation and hygiene conditions.
history.secondDesc: Community and development center “Taraqqiyot” was created with the aim of continuing the activities of the previous infrastructure project while simultaneously implementing other socially significant projects for beneficiaries, especially in rural areas where there are problems in the social life of society.
history.third: This project was aimed at changes or solutions to outdated or dysfunctional forms of social life since post-Soviet times. And also eliminating the stereotype of dependency, when people are accustomed to receiving everything from the state free of charge without any effort.

Team.TeamDesc: The “Taraqqiyot” NGO team consists of specialists and practitioners of various specialties and has united to contribute to the development of the local community. Our organization is always open to new members who can join our team.
Team.TeamPageDesc: The team of the Republican Center 'Tarakkiyot' brings together experienced experts and specialists in the field of introducing innovative methods and technologies aimed at improving the socio-economic well-being of the population of Uzbekistan through the development of local infrastructure.
Team.TeamPageBottomDisc: We are always happy to welcome new specialists and experts who are ready to contribute to the development of key sectors of the economy of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
